interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Floss Picks Review Date: 2019/08/18 Store: BEOKREU Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.48 x 4.92 x 1.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '745679748517'} Review Text: This Floss Picks Dental Floss product contains a total of 200 dental floss. There are 4 separate bags. Each bag contains 50 dental floss. Each bag is resealable.

I have used these particular dental floss at various times of the day for the past 7 days. So far, not one dental floss has broken or become frayed. The floss moves between my teeth in a smooth manner.

This dental floss has no flavor.

I used these dental floss at home, and took a bag with me to work so that I can discreetly used them after eating lunch.

This dental floss works as intended to help me keep my teeth and gums healthy. Review Title: Dental floss moves easily between my teeth. None has broken or frayed so far. No flavor. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

I have used these particular dental floss at various times of the day for the past 7 days. So far, not one dental floss has broken or become frayed. The floss moves between my teeth in a smooth manner.

This dental floss has no flavor.

I used these dental floss at home, and took a bag with me to work so that I can discreetly used them after eating lunch.

This dental floss works as intended to help me keep my teeth and gums healthy. Dental floss moves easily between my teeth. None has broken or frayed so far. No flavor.
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health Conscious**: Shows a strong emphasis on dental hygiene and maintaining healthy teeth and gums.
- **Practical and Functional**: Prefers products that serve their intended purpose effectively, as evidenced by satisfaction with performance and reliability.
- **Convenience-Oriented**: Values products that are easy to use on-the-go, indicating a preference for portable and resealable options.
- **Minimalist Preference**: Opts for unflavored products, suggesting a desire for straightforward, non-complicated solutions.
- **Positive Experience**: Generally favorable attitude towards products that deliver quality and consistency, as reflected in high ratings and positive reviews.
- **Daily User**: Implements dental care routines throughout the day, highlighting a commitment to regular hygiene practices.

This initial interaction highlights a user who is dedicated to personal health and values reliable, convenient products that simplify their dental hygiene routine.
